'''Record Penned by All''' is an interactable found on a table in the structure below the teleport waypoint at [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Natlan]] just east of the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]].<br>It is available after completing the {{Quest|A Fuel Named "Fate"}}.

==Location==
<gallery>
Interactable Record Penned by All Location.png|Location
Interactable Record Penned by All Location Context.png|Additional Context
</gallery>

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Record Penned by All:''' "May the [[Wayob]] grant you peace, and may songs be sung of your life's journey."
:'''Record Penned by All:''' (What follows is a list of names of the deceased, dense as a forest, written by those who mourn them. You see many a familiar name on it.)
:'''Record Penned by All:''' ([[Wayta]], [[Vichama]], [[Batz]], [[Tlilhua]], [[Chuychu]], [[Hunza]]...)
:'''Record Penned by All:''' "We give thanks for the gift of your life in ours. And we look forward to meeting you again one day, in a world of wonder and beauty."
{{Dialogue End}}
